entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 26.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 34. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
